text: @NYGovCuomo > 6,100 nursing home residents in NY have died in connection to #COVID19 , according to the most recent state data, or about 25% of the state’s 24,404 confirmed coronavirus deaths - this is on you buddy #CuomoKilledGrandma #VoteRedToSaveAmerica2020
